bugs.buggy_code: <h1 className="text-6x md:text-7xl font-bold mb-6 bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-400 via-pink-400 to-blue-400 bg-clip-text text-transparent">

bugs.clean_code: <button className="px-8 py-3 bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-500 to-pink-600 rounded-lg hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-purple-500/50 transition transform hover:scale-105 font-semibold">
bugs.buggy_code: <button className="px-8 py-3 bg-gradient-t-r from-purple-500 to-pink-600 rounded-lg hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-purple-500/50 transition transform hover:scale-105 font-semibold">

bugs.clean_code: className="bg-slate-800/30 backdrop-blur border border-slate-700/50 rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:border-purple-400/50 transition cursor-pointer group"
bugs.buggy_code: className="bg-slate-800/30 backdrop-blur border border-slate-700/50 rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:border-purple-400/50 transition cursor-pointer group -mx-4"

bugs.buggy_code: <div className="bg-slate-800/30 backdrop-blur border border-slate-700/50 rounded-xl p-32">
